mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 1 WHEN COUNT(*) >= #{numOfReq,jdbcType=INTEGER} THEN 0 WHEN MAX(A.applied_at) >= DATEADD('SECOND', - #{intervalInSec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM signup_requests AS A WHERE A.mail_addr = #{mailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.applied_at >= DATEADD('SECOND', - #{rangeInSec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND A.deleted_flg = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM signup_requests AS A WHERE A.mail_addr = #{mailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.applied_at >= DATEADD('SECOND', - #{validInSec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND A.deleted_flg = 0 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM signup_requests AS B WHERE B.mail_addr = A.mail_addr AND B.applied_at > A.applied_at AND B.deleted_flg = 0 )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( mail_addr, password, first_name, last_name ) VALUES ( #{mailAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
